mn117:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn117:3.7: ariyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, sammāsamādhiṃ desessāmi saupanisaṃ saparikkhāraṃ.
mn117:3.8: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn117:3.9: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
mn117:4.1: “Katamo ca, bhikkhave, ariyo sammāsamādhi saupaniso saparikkhāro?
mn117:4.3: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati;
mn117:4.4: yā kho, bhikkhave, imehi sattahaṅgehi cittassa ekaggatā parikkhatā—
mn117:4.5: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyo sammāsamādhi saupaniso itipi, saparikkhāro itipi.
mn117:5.2: ‘Natthi dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭhaṃ, natthi hutaṃ, natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, natthi ayaṃ loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mātā, natthi pitā, natthi sattā opapātikā, natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti—
mn117:6.3: atthi, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhi sāsavā puññabhāgiyā upadhivepakkā;
mn117:6.4: atthi, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhi ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgā.
mn117:6.5: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhi sāsavā puññabhāgiyā upadhivepakkā?
mn117:6.6: ‘Atthi dinnaṃ, atthi yiṭṭhaṃ, atthi hutaṃ, atthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, atthi ayaṃ loko, atthi paro loko, atthi mātā, atthi pitā, atthi sattā opapātikā, atthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti—
mn117:6.7: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhi sāsavā puññabhāgiyā upadhivepakkā.
mn117:7.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhi ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgā?
mn117:7.2: Yā kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṃ bhāvayato paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo sammādiṭṭhi maggaṅgaṃ—
mn117:7.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhi ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgā.
mn117:7.4: So micchādiṭṭhiyā pahānāya vāyamati, sammādiṭṭhiyā, upasampadāya, svāssa hoti sammāvāyāmo.
mn117:7.5: So sato micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati, sato sammādiṭṭhiṃ upasampajja viharati, sāssa hoti sammāsati.
mn117:7.6: Itiyime tayo dhammā sammādiṭṭhiṃ anuparidhāvanti anuparivattanti, seyyathidaṃ—
mn117:8.3: Micchāsaṅkappaṃ ‘micchāsaṅkappo’ti pajānāti, sammāsaṅkappaṃ ‘sammāsaṅkappo’ti pajānāti, sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi.
mn117:10.3: atthi, bhikkhave, sammāsaṅkappo sāsavo puññabhāgiyo upadhivepakko;
mn117:10.4: atthi, bhikkhave, sammāsaṅkappo ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo.
mn117:10.5: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammāsaṅkappo sāsavo puññabhāgiyo upadhivepakko?
mn117:11.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammāsaṅkappo ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo?
mn117:11.2: Yo kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṃ bhāvayato takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā vacīsaṅkhāro—
mn117:11.3: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, sammāsaṅkappo ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo.
mn117:11.4: So micchāsaṅkappassa pahānāya vāyamati, sammāsaṅkappassa upasampadāya, svāssa hoti sammāvāyāmo.
mn117:11.5: So sato micchāsaṅkappaṃ pajahati, sato sammāsaṅkappaṃ upasampajja viharati;
mn117:11.7: Itiyime tayo dhammā sammāsaṅkappaṃ anuparidhāvanti anuparivattanti, seyyathidaṃ—
mn117:12.6: Musāvādo, pisuṇā vācā, pharusā vācā, samphappalāpo—
mn117:12.10: atthi, bhikkhave, sammāvācā sāsavā puññabhāgiyā upadhivepakkā;
mn117:12.11: atthi, bhikkhave, sammāvācā ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgā.
mn117:12.12: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sammāvācā sāsavā puññabhāgiyā upadhivepakkā?
mn117:12.13: Musāvādā veramaṇī, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī, samphappalāpā veramaṇī—
mn117:12.14: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, sammāvācā sāsavā puññabhāgiyā upadhivepakkā.
mn117:12.15: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sammāvācā ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgā?
mn117:12.16: Yā kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṃ bhāvayato catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī—
mn117:12.17: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, sammāvācā ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgā.
mn117:12.18: So micchāvācāya pahānāya vāyamati, sammāvācāya upasampadāya;
mn117:12.20: So sato micchāvācaṃ pajahati, sato sammāvācaṃ upasampajja viharati;
mn117:12.22: Itiyime tayo dhammā sammāvācaṃ anuparidhāvanti anuparivattanti, seyyathidaṃ—
mn117:13.10: atthi, bhikkhave, sammākammanto sāsavo puññabhāgiyo upadhivepakko;
mn117:13.11: atthi, bhikkhave, sammākammanto ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo.
mn117:13.12: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammākammanto sāsavo puññabhāgiyo upadhivepakko?
mn117:13.13: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā veramaṇī, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī—
mn117:13.14: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, sammākammanto sāsavo puññabhāgiyo upadhivepakko.
mn117:13.15: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammākammanto ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo?
mn117:13.16: Yā kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṃ bhāvayato tīhi kāyaduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī—
mn117:13.17: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, sammākammanto ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo.
mn117:13.18: So micchākammantassa pahānāya vāyamati, sammākammantassa upasampadāya;
mn117:13.20: So sato micchākammantaṃ pajahati, sato sammākammantaṃ upasampajja viharati;
mn117:13.22: Itiyime tayo dhammā sammākammantaṃ anuparidhāvanti anuparivattanti, seyyathidaṃ—
mn117:14.6: Kuhanā, lapanā, nemittikatā, nippesikatā, lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatā—
mn117:14.10: atthi, bhikkhave, sammāājīvo sāsavo puññabhāgiyo upadhivepakko;
mn117:14.11: atthi, bhikkhave, sammāājīvo ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo.
mn117:14.12: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammāājīvo sāsavo puññabhāgiyo upadhivepakko?
mn117:14.13: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako micchāājīvaṃ pahāya sammāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti—
mn117:14.14: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, sammāājīvo sāsavo puññabhāgiyo upadhivepakko.
mn117:14.15: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammāājīvo ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo?
mn117:14.16: Yā kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṃ bhāvayato micchāājīvā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī—
mn117:14.17: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, sammāājīvo ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo.
mn117:14.18: So micchāājīvassa pahānāya vāyamati, sammāājīvassa upasampadāya;
mn117:14.20: So sato micchāājīvaṃ pajahati, sato sammāājīvaṃ upasampajja viharati;
mn117:14.22: Itiyime tayo dhammā sammāājīvaṃ anuparidhāvanti anuparivattanti, seyyathidaṃ—
mn117:15.3: Sammādiṭṭhissa, bhikkhave, sammāsaṅkappo pahoti, sammāsaṅkappassa sammāvācā pahoti, sammāvācassa sammākammanto pahoti, sammākammantassa sammāājīvo pahoti, sammāājīvassa sammāvāyāmo pahoti, sammāvāyāmassa sammāsati pahoti, sammāsatissa sammāsamādhi pahoti, sammāsamādhissa sammāñāṇaṃ pahoti, sammāñāṇassa sammāvimutti pahoti.
mn117:15.4: Iti kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato sekkho, dasaṅgasamannāgato arahā hoti.
mn117:15.5: Tatrapi sammāñāṇena aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā vigatā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti.
mn117:16.4: Ye ca micchādiṭṭhipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti.
mn117:16.5: Sammādiṭṭhipaccayā aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti.
mn117:16.16: Ye ca micchāvimuttipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti.
mn117:16.17: Sammāvimuttipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti.
mn117:17.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, vīsati kusalapakkhā, vīsati akusalapakkhā—
mn117:17.2: mahācattārīsako dhammapariyāyo pavattito appaṭivattiyo samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṃ.
mn117:18.1: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā imaṃ mahācattārīsakaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ garahitabbaṃ paṭikkositabbaṃ maññeyya tassa diṭṭheva dhamme dasasahadhammikā vādānuvādā gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchanti—
mn117:18.2: sammādiṭṭhiñce bhavaṃ garahati, ye ca micchādiṭṭhī samaṇabrāhmaṇā te bhoto pujjā, te bhoto pāsaṃsā;
mn117:18.3: sammāsaṅkappañce bhavaṃ garahati, ye ca micchāsaṅkappā samaṇabrāhmaṇā te bhoto pujjā, te bhoto pāsaṃsā;
mn117:18.12: sammāvimuttiñce bhavaṃ garahati, ye ca micchāvimuttī samaṇabrāhmaṇā te bhoto pujjā, te bhoto pāsaṃsā.
mn117:18.13: Yo koci, bhikkhave, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā imaṃ mahācattārīsakaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ garahitabbaṃ paṭikkositabbaṃ maññeyya tassa diṭṭheva dhamme ime dasasahadhammikā vādānuvādā gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchanti.
mn117:18.14: Yepi te, bhikkhave, ahesuṃ okkalā vassabhaññā ahetuvādā akiriyavādā natthikavādā tepi mahācattārīsakaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ na garahitabbaṃ nappaṭikkositabbaṃ amaññiṃsu.
mn117:19.2: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
